greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of primes p satisfying n <= p <= 2n.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for n from 1 to 150 do l := 0:for j from n to 2*n do if isprime(j) then l := l+j:fi:od:a[n] := l:od:seq(a[j],j=1..150);
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Aug 12 2002
ext: More terms from _Sascha Kurz_ and Benoit Cloitre, Aug 14 2002
